items.name: Victoria Wonderland
items.short_description: A vibrant mini-theme park featuring classic rides, a bouncy castle, and picnic areas, perfect for family fun by the lake.
items.address: Off Kisumu-Homa Bay Rd, next to Tourist Hotel, Homa Bay Town

items.name: Kendu Bay Kids Carnival
items.short_description: Enjoy a selection of small amusement rides, interactive games, and face painting, offering lively entertainment for young children.
items.address: Beach Road, Kendu Bay

items.name: Mbita Play Park & Go-Karts
items.short_description: A charming play park with a mini go-kart track, swings, and slides, providing active fun for children of all ages.
items.address: Mbita Town Centre, adjacent to the ferry terminal, Mbita

items.name: Ruma Safari Junior Fun Zone
items.short_description: Experience a safari-themed play area with gentle rides, animal character meet-and-greets, and educational wildlife exhibits.
items.address: Adjacent to Ruma National Park entrance, Kamato

items.name: Homa Bay Stargazer Dome
items.short_description: An immersive digital dome showcasing the wonders of the night sky, tailored for young astronomers with engaging stories and visuals.
items.address: Homa Bay Public Library, Posta Road, Homa Bay Town

items.name: Kosiembo Cosmic Classroom
items.short_description: A portable planetarium offering interactive shows about planets, constellations, and space exploration for school groups and families.
items.address: Kosiembo Community Hall, off Mbita Road

items.name: Suna Star Lab
items.short_description: Discover the galaxy in this small, engaging planetarium designed to inspire curiosity about the universe in young minds.
items.address: Suna Primary School Grounds, Rongo-Homa Bay Highway

items.name: Rusinga Night Sky Experience
items.short_description: An open-air viewing platform with telescopes and guided tours, revealing the beauty of the celestial sphere, ideal for older children.
items.address: Rusinga Island Lodge, Rusinga Island

items.name: Homa Bay Kids' Sports Hub
items.short_description: A versatile mini-arena offering football, basketball, and netball courts, plus coaching for various sports disciplines.
items.address: Nyandiwa Estate, Homa Bay Town

items.name: Rongo Mini-Olympics Arena
items.short_description: Dedicated space for children's athletics, including a small running track, long jump pit, and obstacle courses.
items.address: Rongo Town, next to Rongo University

items.name: Kwang'a Multi-Sport Park
items.short_description: A community-focused mini-arena with facilities for tennis, badminton, and a designated area for roller skating and cycling.
items.address: Kwang'a Market Centre, along Kisii-Homa Bay Road

items.name: Mbita Aqua-Sports Zone
items.short_description: Focuses on water-based sports like mini-kayaking and stand-up paddleboarding in a safe, supervised lagoon area, ideal for kids.
items.address: Mbita Point, next to Lake Victoria Sailing Club, Mbita

items.name: Homa Bay Discovery Centre
items.short_description: An interactive museum where kids can explore local history, culture, and science through hands-on exhibits and creative play.
items.address: Government Road, Opp. County Assembly, Homa Bay Town

items.name: Lake Victoria Kids' Heritage Hub
items.short_description: Focuses on the ecology and traditional life around Lake Victoria, with engaging displays on fishing, local crafts, and wildlife.
items.address: Sindo Town, near Sindo Beach, Mbita

items.name: Ruma Wildlife Junior Explorers
items.short_description: A mini-museum dedicated to the animals and plants of Ruma National Park, featuring taxidermy, sound exhibits, and fossil replicas.
items.address: Within Ruma National Park Education Centre, Kamato

items.name: Kendu Bay Art & Play Studio
items.short_description: An experimental space where children can create art, participate in workshops, and explore different materials and techniques.
items.address: Kendu Bay Cultural Centre, Rachuonyo North

items.name: Victoria Lake Aquarium
items.short_description: Explore the diverse aquatic life of Lake Victoria, featuring various fish species, crocodiles, and educational exhibits on freshwater ecosystems.
items.address: Next to Homa Bay Pier, Lake Road, Homa Bay Town

items.name: Rusinga Island Marine Centre
items.short_description: Dedicated to the unique fish and invertebrates found around Rusinga Island, offering touch tanks and guided feeding sessions.
items.address: Kamongo Beach, Rusinga Island

items.name: Sakwa Wetland Wonders
items.short_description: A small educational center showcasing fish, amphibians, and reptiles native to the local wetlands, highlighting their ecological importance.
items.address: Sakwa Bondo, near River Awach Kibuon

items.name: Oyugis Fish Farm & Display
items.short_description: Combines a working fish farm with educational displays about aquaculture, showcasing different types of fish farming and their benefits.
items.address: Oyugis Town, along Kisii-Homa Bay Highway

items.name: Green Acres Kids Farm
items.short_description: A charming farm where children can interact with friendly farm animals, enjoy pony rides, and learn about sustainable farming practices.
items.address: Off Ahero-Kisii Highway, next to Homa Bay Golf Club

items.name: Kendu Bay Organic Gardens & Farm
items.short_description: Kids can participate in planting and harvesting, learn about organic gardening, and meet small livestock in a serene environment.
items.address: Behind Kendu Bay Airstrip, Kendu Bay

items.name: Mbita Dairy Farm Experience
items.short_description: Offers children a chance to milk cows, feed calves, and understand the process of dairy production from farm to table.
items.address: On the way to Rusinga Island Ferry, Mbita

items.name: Kimiru Poultry & Aviary
items.short_description: A fun visit to a specialized poultry farm with various bird species, allowing kids to collect eggs and learn about avian life.
items.address: Kimiru Village, off Homa Bay-Rongo Road

items.name: Homa Bay Treasure Hunt Trails
items.short_description: Embark on an exciting outdoor treasure hunt with clues hidden along scenic trails, leading to a grand 'treasure'.
items.address: Homa Bay Tourist Hotel Gardens, Off Kisumu-Homa Bay Rd

items.name: Ruma Bush Detectives
items.short_description: A thrilling safari-themed quest within a designated area near Ruma National Park, teaching kids tracking and bush skills.
items.address: Ruma National Park buffer zone, Kamato

items.name: Mbita Island Explorer Challenge
items.short_description: Navigate a series of challenges and puzzles across a small island, focusing on navigation and problem-solving skills.
items.address: Mfangano Island (day trip from Mbita Pier)

items.name: Ndhiwa Nature Scavenger Hunt
items.short_description: A free-spirited scavenger hunt in a natural setting, encouraging children to discover local flora and fauna while solving riddles.
items.address: Ndhiwa Community Forest Reserve, Ndhiwa

items.name: Homa Bay Kiddo Magic Theatre
items.short_description: A dedicated venue for enchanting magic and illusion shows, featuring local magicians and interactive acts designed for young audiences.
items.address: Homa Bay Cultural Centre, Off Hospital Road, Homa Bay Town

items.name: Rongo's Whimsical Wonders
items.short_description: A touring magic show that visits schools and community halls, offering dazzling tricks, comedy, and audience participation.
items.address: Various locations in Rongo, check schedule

items.name: Kendu Bay Illusion Palace
items.short_description: A charming, intimate venue for close-up magic, mind-reading acts, and grand illusions that captivate and amaze.
items.address: Kendu Bay Waterfront Plaza, Kendu Bay

items.name: Sakwa Sorcery & Fun Show
items.short_description: An interactive magic show tailored for birthday parties and small events, providing customized performances with a touch of local flair.
items.address: Available for booking in Sakwa & surrounding areas

items.name: Homa Bay Happy Hub
items.short_description: A spacious indoor play center with soft play structures, ball pits, slides, and climbing frames for active fun in any weather.
items.address: Central Business District, Next to KCB Bank, Homa Bay Town

items.name: Oyugis Fun Factory
items.short_description: Features a multi-level play structure, trampolines, and a dedicated toddler zone, ensuring safe and exciting play for all ages.
items.address: Oyugis Shopping Centre, First Floor, Oyugis Town

items.name: Mbita Adventure Play Zone
items.short_description: An indoor adventure center with a small climbing wall, obstacle courses, and interactive gaming stations for older kids.
items.address: Mbita Point, within Mbita Hotel complex, Mbita

items.name: Kendu Bay Creative Kids' Corner
items.short_description: More than just play, this center offers art stations, building blocks, and imaginative play areas alongside a small soft play structure.
items.address: Kendu Bay Town, next to Cooperative Bank

items.name: Homa Bay Storybook Garden
items.short_description: Wander through enchanting gardens featuring life-sized sculptures of beloved fairy tale characters and interactive story points.
items.address: Near Tom Mboya University, Homa Bay Town

items.name: Rongo Realm of Legends
items.short_description: Explore a park dedicated to African folk tales and legends, with themed play areas and performances of traditional stories.
items.address: Rongo Town, along the Oyugis-Rongo Road

items.name: Mbita Mythical Forest
items.short_description: A natural forest trail transformed into a magical journey, where kids encounter mythical creatures and solve nature-based puzzles.
items.address: Near Mbita Hills, along Mbita-Sindo Road

items.name: Kendu Bay Gnome Village
items.short_description: A charming miniature village inhabited by friendly gnomes and fairies, inviting children to imaginative role-play and exploration.
items.address: Kendu Bay Beachfront Park, Kendu Bay
